# <code>wrap</code> for filters

<div class='command-title'>Wrap the value into a column.</div>

## Signature

```> wrap <name>```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Parameters

 * ```name <String>```: the name of the column
## Examples

  Wrap a list into a table with a given column name
```shell
  > echo [1 2 3] | wrap num
```
